<div class="zn-body__read-all"><div class="zn-body__paragraph">Saudi Arabia denies any relationship to the Bezos story, according to de Becker. Saudi Arabian officials and de Becker did not respond to CNN's requests for comment regarding the op-ed over the weekend. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker's article raises the stakes surrounding the National Enquirer's tabloid exposé of a romantic relationship between the billionaire Amazon CEO and <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/10/media/national-enquirer-jeff-bezos-investigation/index.html" target="_blank">Sanchez, a former anchor for Fox's local station in Los Angeles</a>. Bezos has implied that AMI tried to extort him to please the Saudi government — which allegedly has links to AMI and is upset with Bezos-owned Washington Post's coverage of murdered columnist Jamal Khashoggi —or President Donald Trump. AMI says that's not the case. </div><div class="el__embedded el__embedded--fullwidth"><div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth"><div><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg"/></noscript><div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title"><div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos' investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos' extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post's coverage of Jamal Khashoggi's death.</div></div><script name="metaScript" type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "http://schema.org","@type": "ImageObject","name": "Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&#39;s death.","description": "Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&#39;s death.","url": "//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg",}</script></div></div></div><div class="el__leafmedia el__leafmedia--myfinance"><div class="el__embedded el__embedded--partner el__embedded--myfinance"><div class="myFinance-widget" data-campaign="cnnendofcontent" id="cnn-end-of-content"></div></div></div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">In the Daily Beast, de Becker wrote that he and his team spoke with current and former AMI executives and sources, Middle East intelligence experts, Saudi whistleblowers and dissidents, as well as current and former advisers to President Trump, among others, before reaching the conclusion. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">The National Enquirer tried to "strong-arm an American citizen whom[Saudi Arabia's] country's leadership wanted harmed, compromised, and silenced," <a href="https://www.thedailybeast.com/jeff-bezos-investigation-finds-the-saudis-obtained-his-private-information" target="_blank">according to de Becker</a>.</div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">Both Bezos and the Washington Post have been <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/08/politics/donald-trump-jeff-bezos-amazon-affair-national-enquirer/index.html" target="_blank">criticized repeatedly by the president</a>, who has his own links to American Media. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">AMI chairman David Pecker is a longtime friend of Trump's, and the Enquirer was one of Trump's most reliable and enthusiastic media boosters during the campaign. The publisher has admitted to making a payment of $150,000 in cooperation with members of Trump's presidential campaign to prevent former Playboy model Karen McDougal's claims of an affair with Trump from being made public during the 2016 race. Trump denied the affair. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">Federal prosecutors <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2018/12/12/media/american-media-inc-southern-district-new-york/index.html" target="_blank">ultimately struck a non-prosecution agreement</a> with the publisher, effectively ruling out charges for AMI over its role in securing hush money from Trump's personal lawyer Michael Cohen.</div><div class="el__embedded el__embedded--standard"><div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html"><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html">Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer</a></span></div></div></div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker believes that the texts and photographs sent from Bezos and Lauren Sanchez were shared with the National Enquirer by <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html" target="_blank">Michael Sanchez</a>. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">But de Becker claims that the National Enquirer knew about the messages before approaching Sanchez. Sanchez told CNN Business that AMI was already pursuing a story about the relationship when it came to him. He added that "de Becker's latest smoke-and-mirrors distraction " contained "zero evidence."</div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">In its statement, AMI said that "the fact of the matter is, it was Michael Sanchez who tipped the National Enquirer off to the affair on Sept. 10, 2018, and over the course of four months provided all of the materials for our investigation." The spokesperson added that Sanchez's "continued efforts to discuss and falsely represent our reporting, and his role in it, has waived any source confidentiality."</div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker argues that the first source is the Saudi Arabian government. He said that the Saudi leadership wanted to harm Bezos because of the Washington Post's coverage of Khashoggi's death. Khashoggi, who had been critical of Saudi Arabia and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman,  was <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/03/middleeast/khashoggi-murder-trial-starts-intl/index.html" target="_blank">killed and dismembered</a> in the Saudi Arabian consulate in Istanbul in the fall. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">The Saudis have presented shifting stories about Khashoggi's fate, initially denying any knowledge before arguing that a group of rogue operators, many of whom belong to bin Salman's inner circle, were responsible for the journalist's death. Riyadh has maintained that neither bin Salman nor King Salman knew of the operation to target Khashoggi. US officials, however, have said such a mission — including 15 men sent from Riyadh — could not have been carried out without the authorization of bin Salman.</div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">The Washington Post has been closely covering the incident, and Bezos was <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2018/11/05/tech/saudis-amazon-boycott/index.html" target="_blank">the target of a pro-Saudi campaign wielded by Saudi social media users</a> and a<a href="https://www.cnn.com/videos/business/2019/02/12/jeff-bezos-washington-post-saudi-ami.cnn-business/video/playlists/business-jeff-bezos/" target="_blank"> Saudi journalist</a> in the wake of Khashoggi's death that called for a boycott against Amazon and Souq, an e-commerce site owned by Amazon. </div><div class="el__embedded el__embedded--standard"><div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html"><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html">As questions linger around Jeff Bezos' explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed</a></span></div></div></div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">Bezos himself called attention to the connection between AMI and Saudi Arabia in an <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/07/media/jeff-bezos-ami-blackmail/index.html" target="_blank">explosive blog post he published to Medium in February</a> accusing AMI of trying to blackmail him with proof of the affair. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">In the post, Bezos noted that AMI has been investigated "for various actions they've taken on behalf of the Saudi Government." </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">He pointed to an Associated Press story about AMI's publication of a glossy magazine celebrating Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's visit to the United States in April 2018. AMI denied that Saudis had directed the magazine's production or paid for it, but the AP reported that three weeks before the prince's arrival, the media company sent a copy to the Saudi embassy, where it circulated among officials who then shared it with Washington foreign policy contacts. AMI said it didn't share an advance copy of the report with the Saudis, <a href="https://www.apnews.com/d293d282a9ec4d0c83fe0a25ff5f285c" target="_blank">AP said in their story</a>. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker also referred to the story as evidence of a connection between AMI and the Saudi government. </div><div class="ad ad--epic ad--mobile" data-ad-text="show"><div data-ad-id="ad_rect_btf_01" data-ad-position="mobile" data-ad-refresh="default"></div></div><ul class="cn cn-list-hierarchical-xs cn--idx-32 cn-zoneAdContainer" data-layout="list-hierarchical-xs"></ul><div class="zn-body__paragraph">Saudi Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Adel al-Jubeir has in the past denied any connection between his country and AMI to CNN. </div><div class="zn-body__paragraph"><em>-— CNN's Brian Stelter, Oliver Darcy, Tom Kludt, Nicole Gaouette, Nada Altaher, Chandler Thornton and Sheena McKenzie contributed to this report. </em></div></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">Saudi Arabia denies any relationship to the Bezos story, according to de Becker. Saudi Arabian officials and de Becker did not respond to CNN's requests for comment regarding the op-ed over the weekend. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker's article raises the stakes surrounding the National Enquirer's tabloid exposé of a romantic relationship between the billionaire Amazon CEO and <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/10/media/national-enquirer-jeff-bezos-investigation/index.html" target="_blank">Sanchez, a former anchor for Fox's local station in Los Angeles</a>. Bezos has implied that AMI tried to extort him to please the Saudi government — which allegedly has links to AMI and is upset with Bezos-owned Washington Post's coverage of murdered columnist Jamal Khashoggi —or President Donald Trump. AMI says that's not the case. </div>
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--fullwidth"><div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth"><div><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg"/></noscript><div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title"><div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos' investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos' extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post's coverage of Jamal Khashoggi's death.</div></div><script name="metaScript" type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "http://schema.org","@type": "ImageObject","name": "Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&#39;s death.","url": "//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg",}</script></div></div></div>
<div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth"><div><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; <div><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&amp;#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&amp;#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&amp;#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&amp;#39;s death." class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg"/></noscript><div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title"><div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos' investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos' extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post's coverage of Jamal Khashoggi's death.</div></div><script name="metaScript" type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "http://schema.org","@type": "ImageObject","name": "Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos&#39; investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos&#39; extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post&#39;s coverage of Jamal Khashoggi&#39;s death.","url": "//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190331122113-bezos-gavin-de-becker-saudi-arabia-leak-large-169.jpg",}</script></div>
<div class="img__preloader"></div>
<div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title"><div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos' investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos' extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post's coverage of Jamal Khashoggi's death.</div></div>
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Writing for the Daily Beast, Bezos' investigator Gavin de Becker accused the Saudi government of leaking proof of Bezos' extramarital relatoinship to the National Enquirer because of the Washington Post's coverage of Jamal Khashoggi's death.</div>
<div class="el__leafmedia el__leafmedia--myfinance"><div class="el__embedded el__embedded--partner el__embedded--myfinance"><div class="myFinance-widget" data-campaign="cnnendofcontent" id="cnn-end-of-content"></div></div></div>
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--partner el__embedded--myfinance"><div class="myFinance-widget" data-campaign="cnnendofcontent" id="cnn-end-of-content"></div></div>
<div class="myFinance-widget" data-campaign="cnnendofcontent" id="cnn-end-of-content"></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">In the Daily Beast, de Becker wrote that he and his team spoke with current and former AMI executives and sources, Middle East intelligence experts, Saudi whistleblowers and dissidents, as well as current and former advisers to President Trump, among others, before reaching the conclusion. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">The National Enquirer tried to "strong-arm an American citizen whom[Saudi Arabia's] country's leadership wanted harmed, compromised, and silenced," <a href="https://www.thedailybeast.com/jeff-bezos-investigation-finds-the-saudis-obtained-his-private-information" target="_blank">according to de Becker</a>.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">Both Bezos and the Washington Post have been <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/08/politics/donald-trump-jeff-bezos-amazon-affair-national-enquirer/index.html" target="_blank">criticized repeatedly by the president</a>, who has his own links to American Media. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">AMI chairman David Pecker is a longtime friend of Trump's, and the Enquirer was one of Trump's most reliable and enthusiastic media boosters during the campaign. The publisher has admitted to making a payment of $150,000 in cooperation with members of Trump's presidential campaign to prevent former Playboy model Karen McDougal's claims of an affair with Trump from being made public during the 2016 race. Trump denied the affair. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">Federal prosecutors <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2018/12/12/media/american-media-inc-southern-district-new-york/index.html" target="_blank">ultimately struck a non-prosecution agreement</a> with the publisher, effectively ruling out charges for AMI over its role in securing hush money from Trump's personal lawyer Michael Cohen.</div>
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--standard"><div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html"><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html">Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer</a></span></div></div></div>
<div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html"><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html">Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer</a></span></div></div>
<div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html"><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190110172320-jeff-bezos-divorce-national-enquirer-investigation-carroll-dnt-lead-vpx-00002003-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div>
<div class="img__preloader"></div>
<div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/08/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-timeline/index.html">Billionaire divorce. Supermarket tabloid. Extortion claim — Jeff Bezos and the National Enquirer</a></span></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker believes that the texts and photographs sent from Bezos and Lauren Sanchez were shared with the National Enquirer by <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html" target="_blank">Michael Sanchez</a>. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">But de Becker claims that the National Enquirer knew about the messages before approaching Sanchez. Sanchez told CNN Business that AMI was already pursuing a story about the relationship when it came to him. He added that "de Becker's latest smoke-and-mirrors distraction " contained "zero evidence."</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">In its statement, AMI said that "the fact of the matter is, it was Michael Sanchez who tipped the National Enquirer off to the affair on Sept. 10, 2018, and over the course of four months provided all of the materials for our investigation." The spokesperson added that Sanchez's "continued efforts to discuss and falsely represent our reporting, and his role in it, has waived any source confidentiality."</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker argues that the first source is the Saudi Arabian government. He said that the Saudi leadership wanted to harm Bezos because of the Washington Post's coverage of Khashoggi's death. Khashoggi, who had been critical of Saudi Arabia and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman,  was <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/03/middleeast/khashoggi-murder-trial-starts-intl/index.html" target="_blank">killed and dismembered</a> in the Saudi Arabian consulate in Istanbul in the fall. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">The Saudis have presented shifting stories about Khashoggi's fate, initially denying any knowledge before arguing that a group of rogue operators, many of whom belong to bin Salman's inner circle, were responsible for the journalist's death. Riyadh has maintained that neither bin Salman nor King Salman knew of the operation to target Khashoggi. US officials, however, have said such a mission — including 15 men sent from Riyadh — could not have been carried out without the authorization of bin Salman.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">The Washington Post has been closely covering the incident, and Bezos was <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2018/11/05/tech/saudis-amazon-boycott/index.html" target="_blank">the target of a pro-Saudi campaign wielded by Saudi social media users</a> and a<a href="https://www.cnn.com/videos/business/2019/02/12/jeff-bezos-washington-post-saudi-ami.cnn-business/video/playlists/business-jeff-bezos/" target="_blank"> Saudi journalist</a> in the wake of Khashoggi's death that called for a boycott against Amazon and Souq, an e-commerce site owned by Amazon. </div>
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--standard"><div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html"><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html">As questions linger around Jeff Bezos' explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed</a></span></div></div></div>
<div class="el__storyelement--standard el__article--embed"><div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html"><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div><div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html">As questions linger around Jeff Bezos' explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed</a></span></div></div>
<div class="el__article--teaseimage"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html"><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image media__image--responsive" data-demand-load="not-loaded" data-eq-pts="mini: 0,  xsmall: 221,  small: 308,  medium: 461,  large:  781" data-src-full16x9="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-full-169.jpg" data-src-large="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-super-169.jpg" data-src-medium="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-exlarge-169.jpg" data-src-mini="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-169.jpg" data-src-mini1x1="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-small-11.jpg" data-src-small="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg" data-src-xsmall="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-medium-plus-169.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAJAJEAAAAAAP///////wAAACH5BAEAAAIALAAAAAAQAAkAAAIKlI+py+0Po5yUFQA7"/><div class="img__preloader"></div><noscript><img alt="As questions linger around Jeff Bezos&amp;#39; explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed" class="media__image" src="//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/190212152904-jeff-bezos-evidence-restricted-large-169.jpg"/></noscript></a></div>
<div class="img__preloader"></div>
<div class="media__caption el__storyelement__title"><span class="el__storyelement__header"><a href="/2019/02/13/media/jeff-bezos-national-enquirer-leaker/index.html">As questions linger around Jeff Bezos' explosive suggestions, identity of tabloid leaker is confirmed</a></span></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">Bezos himself called attention to the connection between AMI and Saudi Arabia in an <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2019/02/07/media/jeff-bezos-ami-blackmail/index.html" target="_blank">explosive blog post he published to Medium in February</a> accusing AMI of trying to blackmail him with proof of the affair. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">In the post, Bezos noted that AMI has been investigated "for various actions they've taken on behalf of the Saudi Government." </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">He pointed to an Associated Press story about AMI's publication of a glossy magazine celebrating Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's visit to the United States in April 2018. AMI denied that Saudis had directed the magazine's production or paid for it, but the AP reported that three weeks before the prince's arrival, the media company sent a copy to the Saudi embassy, where it circulated among officials who then shared it with Washington foreign policy contacts. AMI said it didn't share an advance copy of the report with the Saudis, <a href="https://www.apnews.com/d293d282a9ec4d0c83fe0a25ff5f285c" target="_blank">AP said in their story</a>. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">De Becker also referred to the story as evidence of a connection between AMI and the Saudi government. </div>
<div class="ad ad--epic ad--mobile" data-ad-text="show"><div data-ad-id="ad_rect_btf_01" data-ad-position="mobile" data-ad-refresh="default"></div></div>
<div data-ad-id="ad_rect_btf_01" data-ad-position="mobile" data-ad-refresh="default"></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph">Saudi Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Adel al-Jubeir has in the past denied any connection between his country and AMI to CNN. </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph"><em>-— CNN's Brian Stelter, Oliver Darcy, Tom Kludt, Nicole Gaouette, Nada Altaher, Chandler Thornton and Sheena McKenzie contributed to this report. </em></div>

All content of the Dow Jones branded indices Copyright S&amp;P Dow Jones Indices LLC 2018 and/or its affiliates.</p><p>© 2019 Cable News Network. <a class="m-copyright__links" data-analytics="footer_turner-broadcasting-system-inc" href="http://www.turner.com" title="Turner Broadcasting System, Inc.">Turner Broadcasting System, Inc.</a> All Rights Reserved.<br/>CNN Sans ™ &amp; © 2016 Cable News Network.</p></span></div><div class="m-legal"><ul class="m-legal__list"><li class="m-legal__list__item"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_newsletters" href="/newsletters">Newsletters</a></li><li class="m-legal__list__item"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_contact-us" href="/feedback">Contact Us</a></li><li class="m-legal__list__item"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_terms-of-use" href="/terms">Terms of Use</a></li><li class="m-legal__list__item"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_privacy-policy" href="/privacy">Privacy Policy</a></li><li class="m-legal__list__item"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_accessibility-cc" href="/accessibility">Accessibility &amp; CC</a></li><li class="m-legal__list__item last-child"><a class="m-legal__links" data-analytics="footer_adchoices" href="https://preferences-mgr.truste.com/?pid=turnermedia01&amp;aid=turnermedia01&amp;type=turner_pop&amp;site=turner.com&amp;action=notice&amp;country=us&amp;locale=en&amp;behavior=implied&amp;from=http://consent.truste.com/">AdChoices</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
